subdisciplines.name: Astrochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemical composition of astronomical objects, including stars and planets.

subdisciplines.name: Astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: The application of the principles of physics to the study of astronomical objects and phenomena, including the structure and evolution of stars and galaxies.

subdisciplines.name: Cosmology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the origin, evolution, and structure of the Universe.

subdisciplines.name: Exoplanetology
subdisciplines.description: The study of planets beyond our solar system.

subdisciplines.name: Galactic Astronomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structure, dynamics, and evolution of galaxies.

subdisciplines.name: High-Energy Astrophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of astronomical objects and phenomena that emit high-energy radiation, including X-rays and gamma rays.

subdisciplines.name: Radio Astronomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of astronomical objects and phenomena that emit radio waves, including stars, galaxies, and black holes.

subdisciplines.name: Solar Astronomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the Sun, its properties, and its effects on the Solar System.
